[[File:Image oedema.png|vignette|Œdema of the lower limbs with bucket]]

properties.question: What does the 'bucket sign' on a photograph of oedema in the lower limbs indicate?
properties.option_a: A bone fracture in the affected area
properties.option_b: A collection of fluid in the lower limbs resembling a bucket
properties.option_c: A sign of muscle atrophy due to prolonged immobility
properties.option_d: A pattern of skin discoloration unrelated to fluid retention
